Review_title: Nailed it. People are sad and unhappy. Life is bad and will get worse.
Review_Text: The stories in The Great American Lie were so powerful and moving. This is such an important message they are sharing and so thoughtfully and intelligently executed. I hope that the film reaches a very wide audience.

The worst waste of time on screen today. If you are a professional victim like these idiots, I feel sorry for you and your parents have failed on every level. This pushes the idea that rich people work to keep poor people down and there is no way out of it. Sad and unrealistic

Extremely well done, more Americans need to wake up and pay attention to the history that has lead up to this point in time. Go into the movie with an open mind and you will find yourself learning a lot about this country, our history, and what needs to be done to ensure a better future. A lot of people are too quick to judge based on their own political ideologies, put that aside and just pay attention to what the film is really about. We need to come together to fix these issues and it's never going to happen if too many people only absorb information that aligns with their already determined political ideology.
